Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Dietary Supplement/Vitamin D Analog/DN-101
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An oral high dose formulation of calcitriol, the biologically active form of Vitamin D. Acting as a ligand for the Vitamin D receptor (VDR), DN-101 binds to the VDR inhibiting VDR-regulated gene transcription involved in cell proliferation, differentiation and apoptosis. (NCI)
